DOC.brief_title: A Trial Mindfulness Based Cognitive Therapy Programme Informal Caregivers People With Chronic Illnesses
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim project pilot test delivery Mindfulness Based Cognitive Therapy ( MBCT ) programme informal caregiver people chronic illnesses one region Ireland determine feasibility deliver intervention caregiver Ireland . A two-group randomised pilot-feasibility trial compare MBCT programme ( intervention ) programme ( control ) . The MBCT programme deliver group format 8 week session 2hours/week . Participants encourage practice mindfulness exercise homework related cognitive process session . The programme deliver trained mindfulness teacher . The study sample caregiver Dublin region member Family Carers ' Ireland . A total 40 caregiver recruit study , 20 per group , base 1:1 randomisation use computer-randomised number generator . Baseline ( pre-intervention ) post intervention participant outcome data ( stress , mindfulness QoL ) collect use self-reported validated scale administer participant post , stamped-addressed envelope provide return . Other pilot measure ( i.e . study process ) monitor assess research team determine potential refinement need . Feasibility outcome data collect research team ( include time recruit , attendance class , willingness participant randomise ) participant ( expense diary ) study period , use predesigned data collection form . Mean differences 95 % confidence interval calculate determine significant difference group outcomes stress , mindfulness QoL .
